name: prompter-extension
description: Chrome extension for formatting text with AI templates

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev: vite build --mode development && npm run build:content
scripts.build:production: npm run clean && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:prod: vite build --mode production && npm run build:content
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test

author: Prompter Extension Team
